segments.text: May I ask you how much this position pays per year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This job pays sixty-five thousand dollars per year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of benefits does this job have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This job provides full medical , dental , and disability .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What type of vacation time do we get ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You get 3 weeks paid vacation that you may use as you wish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We offer a 401K with some matching funds available depending on length of service .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What type of professional development do you offer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We provide up-to-date training on state of the art equipment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do I sign up for my benefits package ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Down the hall . I'll show you when the interview is over .
segments.speaker: S2
